document.full_text: british singer cheryl cole will not be appearing on the british version of "the x factor", after reportedly being dropped from the upcoming u.s. launch of the popular tv talent show.
document.title: cheryl cole out of uk "x factor" after u.s. hitch
lines_and_colors: british singer cheryl cole will not be appearing on the british version of "the x factor", after reportedly being dropped from the upcoming u.s. launch of the popular tv talent show.
